column4: anyone know how to shutoff system messages in IRC with pidgin?
I don't think you mean system message, you mean ChanServ and Nickserv?
ahh, that could be the proper words. is there a way to shut them off?
I will google with those words too. :)
don't really think so, I've tried setting "ignore" for those two, and they still show up.
ok, thanks
reason I say is Pidgin doesn't show true IRC system messages
ohh, I just started using pidgin for IRC because I wanted the smiley faces, xchat didn't have them. :)
you got openshot installed?
yep, ppa
ahh, ok, because I tried their installer, and it really left me a mess
http://www.openshotvideo.com/2009/09/openshot-ppa-come-and-get-it.html
thanks, you got it before I asked.
when you installed openshot via the ppa you didn't have any problems?
does it depend on mplayer or ffmpeg?  I have modified, newer versions installed
on jaunty, not that I remember, haven't gotten around to trying on karmic yet
I'm working on jaunty, so that is fine
let's check the dependencies.
I will have to check it out, I'm glad to see they have a ppa
thanks for the info on that too.
thanks for the link on openshot, got it installed and it opened up great, I will play with it later.
